physical_appearance:This is a photograph of taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor) in Indonesia. There is a river
 surrounded by thick vegetation on either side in the center of the photograph. On the right
 there is a small shelter. There is a man standing under the shelter. He is wearing a uniform with a helmet. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph. The photograph is slightly folded at the top-right corner.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor) in Indonesia. There is a river, surrounded by thick vegetation on either side in the center of the photograph. On the right, there is a small shelter. There is a man standing under the shelter. He is wearing a uniform with a helmet. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph. The photograph is slightly folded at the top-right corner.
